usageProfile.summary: Summary of how often and in what contexts you use AI.
usageProfile.notes: Use AI daily for ideation and occasional coding tasks.

userLevel.reason: Precise prompts, knows capabilities and limits of AI, regular punctual usage.

tips: Practice crafting clearer, more specific prompts.
Learn prompt engineering patterns and templates.
Explore APIs and automation to integrate AI into workflows.
Review model outputs critically and iterate on prompts.
